trans-unit.source: Send push notifications to authenticated universal Windows app users.
trans-unit.target: Send push notifications to authenticated universal Windows app users.

trans-unit.source: Learn how to send push notifications from Azure Mobile Services to specific users of your universal Windows C# app.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to send push notifications from Azure Mobile Services to specific users of your universal Windows C# app.

trans-unit.source: Send push notifications to authenticated users
trans-unit.target: Send push notifications to authenticated users

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticated user on any registered device.
trans-unit.target: This topic shows you how to send push notifications to an authenticated user on any registered device.

trans-unit.source: Unlike the previous [Add push notifications to your app] tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.
trans-unit.target: Unlike the previous [Add push notifications to your app] tutorial, this tutorial changes your mobile service to require that a user be authenticated before the client can register with the notification hub for push notifications.

trans-unit.source: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.
trans-unit.target: Registration is also modified to add a tag based on the assigned user ID.

trans-unit.source: Finally, the server script is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.
trans-unit.target: Finally, the server script is updated to send the notification only to the authenticated user instead of to all registrations.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial walks you through the following process:
trans-unit.target: This tutorial walks you through the following process:

trans-unit.source: [Updating the service to require authentication for registration]
trans-unit.target: [Updating the service to require authentication for registration]

trans-unit.source: [Updating the app to log in before registration]
trans-unit.target: [Updating the app to log in before registration]

trans-unit.source: [Testing the app]
trans-unit.target: [Testing the app]

trans-unit.source: This tutorial supports both Windows Store and Windows Phone Store apps.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial supports both Windows Store and Windows Phone Store apps.

trans-unit.source: Prerequisites
trans-unit.target: Prerequisites

trans-unit.source: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:
trans-unit.target: Before you start this tutorial, you must have already completed these Mobile Services tutorials:

trans-unit.source:
[Add authentication to your app]
Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.
trans-unit.target:
[Add authentication to your app]
Adds a login requirement to the TodoList sample app.

trans-unit.source:
[Add push notifications to your app]
Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.
trans-unit.target:
[Add push notifications to your app]
Configures the TodoList sample app for push notifications by using Notification Hubs.

trans-unit.source: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.
trans-unit.target: After you have completed both tutorials, you can prevent unauthenticated users from registering for push notifications from your mobile service.

trans-unit.source: Update the service to require authentication to register
trans-unit.target: Update the service to require authentication to register

trans-unit.target: 5.

trans-unit.target: Replace the insert function with the following code, then click **Save**:

trans-unit.source: This insert script uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all Windows Store app registrations created by the logged-in user.
trans-unit.target: This insert script uses the user ID tag to send a push notification (with the text of the inserted item) to all Windows Store app registrations created by the logged-in user.

trans-unit.target: Update the app to log in before registration
